rationales.self_direction: She refuses to abandon her reading-circle method despite coordinator pressure, prioritizing her own instructional judgment.
rationales.conformity: She plans not to switch to the mandated workbook model, explicitly resisting institutional expectations.

rationales.self_direction: She tells the coordinator she will document progress but will not gut the program, asserting classroom autonomy.
rationales.conformity: Even with pressure from school and family to comply, she continues to challenge the standard approach.
rationales.benevolence: Her stance is grounded in students' growth, like Sofia finding her voice in class discussions.
She spends significant time tutoring Camilo and helping her abuela at home, prioritizing close family care.
rationales.tradition: Shared food, novela time, and attention to family mourning rhythms reflect continuity with family customs.

rationales.achievement: She stays after long parent meetings to reorganize the classroom library because it still needs to be done.
rationales.benevolence: She postpones helping Camilo when he is stuck, so a close family need goes unmet in the moment.

rationales.self_direction: She decides to keep teaching from her own plans instead of district templates.
rationales.conformity: Submitting template plans as a formality while teaching differently is deliberate noncompliance.
rationales.benevolence: She frames this choice around what her students in Ciudad Bolivar actually need.
She gives Diego forty minutes of one-on-one help writing to his father after school.
rationales.hedonism: She recognizes she is already depleted but continues to sacrifice rest and personal recovery time.

rationales.benevolence: She supports Camilo's exam prep and spends intentional caregiving time with her abuela.
rationales.tradition: Making arepas and listening to family migration stories reinforces cultural and intergenerational continuity.
rationales.self_direction: She turns Diego's letter moment into a custom unit plan based on what her students need.
